summary: More Alluring variations on the Allure skill! Check them out, pick the one you want!
descriptionHtml:
\"Is that an Amulet of Mara? I\'m surprised someone like you isn\'t spoken for!\"

\"Ysolda? I thought you weren\'t into girls.\"

\"I\'m not! But ever since you slipped me that mammoth tusk, I can\'t get you out of my mind!\"

\"...That sounded incredibly dirty. Okay, let\'s get hitched!\"

\"Yay!\"

[i][b]Later...[/b][/i]

\"Hey hon! Can I buy something from the shop and get my Allluuuuuuure discount? \"

\"No discount!\"

\"...What.\"

\"And take out the trash.\"

???
...

Sorry about that. Anyway, I found it odd that Everyone Is Bi for the Dragonborn, but Allure only works on the opposite gender. Of course, if you make it affect both genders, it\'s just another rank of Haggling. So I thought, hey! Why not make it so you\'re more persuasive, as well? 

So I made a mod. Then I thought, Hm! Maybe there\'s a reason you\'re so attractive to people! Maybe you\'re really fit or something!

So I made another mod. Then I thought, whoa! Maybe you\'re like a hella sexy Dovakiin with sinewy limbs and tight abs and you\'re really impressive to the point where people either want you, want to be you, or they\'re kind of intimidated by you or OH SWEET MARA I GOTTA CUT DOWN ON THE COFFEE.

So, here you are. A whole bunch of versions of the same mod, each one buffing and renaming the Allure perk! They are as follows...

1. [b]AlluringAllure[/b]: 10% better prices and cheaper bribes, Persuade attempts 15% easier.

2. [b]AlluringlyAttractive[/b]: 10% better prices and cheaper bribes, Persuade attempts 15% easier, Health, Stamina, and Magicka recover 10% faster.

3. [b]AlluringlyImpressive[/b]: 10% better prices/cheaper bribes, 15% easier to Persuade and Intimidate, +10% Health/Stamina/Magicka recovery.

4. [b]AlluringlyImpressiveLover[/b]: 10% better prices/cheaper bribes, 15% easier Persuade/Intimidate, +10% Health/Stamina/Magicka recovery, Permanent Lover\'s Comfort bonus (skills increase 15% faster).

5. [b]AlluringlyImpressive-Hardcore[/b]: 10% better prices/cheaper bribes, 15% easier Persuasion/Intimidation. No recovery or skill bonus buffs.

You can only use one at a time, so pick the one you like!

PLEASE NOTE: This obviously won\'t be compatible with any other mod that changes the Allure perk; in which case, the mod that\'s LOWER on your load list will take priority. This mod also changes the PerkQuest script (it was the only way I could see to make Persuade easier), so it\'ll conflict with any mod that changes that script, as well.

Another caveat: I\'m not entirely sure how the new Allure perk will interact with the Persuasion perk. I can think of two possibilities. One, Persuasion\'s greater effect will overshadow Allure\'s, much like the whole Lover\'s Comfort/ Well Rested thing. Possibility Two is... they\'ll interact multiplicatively, which means that you\'ll end up with Persuade attempts that are roughly 40% easier. Which could lead to situations like this...

Thief: \"Hey! You! Gimmie yer money!\" >:(

You: \"No. Go write your mother and tell her she was right about everything.\" ?_?

Thief: \"...Okay...\" ?_?

So yeah, if you run into any bugs, lemme know. And if you really really want to use the mod but need some sort of compatibility patch, post in comments and let me know. If I get some expresso in me, I\'ll see what I can do. :P
author: TwilightStar
